events.name: resize
events.description: Emitted when layout size (height, width) changes
events.description_zh: 布局大小（高度、宽度）更改时发出

events.name: scroll
events.description: Emitted when user scrolls within layout
events.description_zh: 当用户在布局中滚动时发出

events.name: scroll-height
events.description: Emitted when the scroll size of layout changes
events.description_zh: 当布局的滚动大小发生变化时发出

view.description: Defines how your layout components (header/footer/drawer) should be placed on screen; See docs examples
view.description_zh: 定义布局组件（页眉/页脚/抽屉）应如何在屏幕上放置;查看文档示例

container.description: Containerize the layout which means it changes the default behavior of expanding to the whole window; Useful (but not limited to) for when using on a QDialog
container.description_zh: 容器化布局，这意味着它会更改扩展到整个窗口的默认行为;在 QDialog 上使用时有用（但不限于）
